dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg:
I am Meursault. I aid the Big Brother in his endeavors.
That is all.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Good morning. Let us head to the living room together. My fellow junior Brothers, senior Brothers, and Sisters want to have a chat with you.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: If you have no particular outdoor activities scheduled, then join the other remaining family for a meal. It is important that the Middle always dine and chat together.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I... have been summoned by a senior Brother and must visit our site of business. I can not 'flake' on a drinking night with my senior Brothers. That is the rule.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Us junior Brothers do not concern ourselves with seniority amongst ourselves. It is a detail of very little significance. All we wish to do is to support each other and our senior Brothers, and no more.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Little mistakes may occur within a family. It is my little joy to sweep such little mistakes under the rug. I have been taught that that is true loyalty.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg:
These chains represent solidarity and connection. Together, we who are bound by the same chain bear the responsibilities hand in hand. We will face our destinies and share the weight together.
We have no need to remove these chains. We have no means to remove these chains. And we have no need for those who intend to remove these chains.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Many things are written in The Book of Vengeance. From instructions for avenging a Brother's death to instructions for avenging getting our foot stepped on in the streets. This time, I will refer to Title 3, Section 1...

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: The Middle always pays their debts. There are no 'little mistakes', unless the mistake is from one of us.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: I am not used to... being on my lonesome.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Has something happened to you? Please, come here and tell me what transpired, in full detail. I will add it to the Book of Vengeance so that this offense may be avenged.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: For my senior Brothers and Sisters.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: I will conduct a warm-up exercise.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I am reading the Book.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Vengeance comes for you.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: You should have prepared for retribution when you slighted a member of our family.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Kgh.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Vengeance has been executed.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: I won't... Be the last... of us... The Middle... Remembers...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Hm. I have done it.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: ... A family member better suited for this job will take over.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: This has been taken care of. We can cross that out from the Book of Vengeance.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Conditions as written on the Book of Vengeance have been fulfilled. This is what happens when one lays their hands upon a member of our family. Do not forget that.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: It is all right. Their crimes are now written in the Book of Vengeance... The Middle remembers. The family will now come to claim their vengeance.
